form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Marriage and Immigration Status Form, N-4 12/05/86 N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 21. What is your present marital status? Married Widowed Divorced Single 22. Complete the following regarding your husband or wife if you are currently married. First (given) name Date married (Month/Day/Year) Date of birth (Month/Day/Year) Country of birth LAU 09-15-1939 11-10-1917 CHINA Place he or she entered the U.S. Date entered the U.S. (Month/Day/Year) His or her Alien Registration Number Present immigration status HONOLULU, HAWAII 05-01-1969 A 17-195-430 CITIZEN Date naturalized (Month/Day/Year) Place naturalized Present address (street and number) City and State or country 04-11-1975 LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 1963 ROSE VILLA ST. PASADENA, CA 91170 23. Complete the following if you were previously married. Total number of times you have been married 1 Name of prior husband or wife Date of marriage (Month/Day/Year) Date marriage ended (Month/Day/Year) How marriage ended INS status Alien NONE Citizen Alien Citizen Alien Citizen 24. Complete the following if your present husband or wife was previously married. Total number of times your husband or wife has been married I Name of prior, husband or wife Date of marriage (Month/Day/Year) Date marriage ended (Month/Day/Year) How marriage ended INS status Alien NONE Citizen Alien Citizen Alien Citizen 25. Complete all columns for each of your children. (If child lives with you, state "withme" in Location column; otherwise, give the City and State of that child's residence.) 2 Indicate your total number of children Given name Date of birth Country of birth Date of entry Port of entry Location Alien Registration No. Sex FOIA (b)(6) Male WING KONG 06-11-40 HONG KONG 05-15-83 SAN FRANCISCO PASADENA Female Male MING KONG 07-26-47 HONG KONG HONG KONG Female no with Male Female Male Female Male Female Male Female Male Female 26. Complete the following with regard to each absence you have had from the United States for a period of six months or less since you entered for permanent residence. (If none, write "None".) Ship, airline, railroad or bus company, or other means used to return to the United States. Returned at (Place or port of entry) Date departed Date returned JAPAN AIRLINES LOS ANGELES AIRPORT 06-1987 09-1987 NORTHWEST AIRLINES LOS ANGELES AIRPORT 04-1986 06-1986 No its 27. Complete the following with regard to each absence you have had from the United States for a period of six months or more since you entered for permanent residence. (If none, write "None") Ship. airline, railroad or bus company, or other means used to return to the United States. Returned at (Place or port of entry) Date departed Date returned NONE Form N-400 (12/05/86) N Page 2
